name: Mbasha Seth
title: CS Student | NLP Researcher | Equitech Fellow
subtitle: Building data solutions for social impact across Africa
bio: Computer Science student at Uganda Christian University (CGPA: 3.9/5.0) and Equitech Futures Applied Data Institute Fellow, selected as 1 of 25 globally. My work focuses on NLP for low-resource African languages, embedded systems, and data solutions for social impact. Currently building analytics tools for water utilities across Uganda, Cameroon, Malawi, and Lesotho.
tagline: NLP for African Languages | Data for Social Impact
